parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The ID of the container cluster.

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. The value is a UNIX timestamp.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The start of the time range to query. The value is a UNIX timestamp.
